title: Alexa, Flirt Mode
tip: Ask Alexa to activate flirt mode and see what she says...

title: Alexa, Beatbox!
tip: Say: 'Alexa, can you beatbox?' and enjoy the show.

title: Alexa, Self Destruct
tip: Say: 'Alexa, self destruct.' She'll go full Star Trek.

title: Alexa, What Happens If You Step On LEGO?
tip: Ask Alexa what happens if you step on a LEGO. Painfully accurate.
command: Alexa, what happens if you step on LEGO?

title: Alexa, Rap Battle!
tip: Ask Alexa to rap battle. (She will, and itâ€™s ridiculous.)

title: Alexa, Tell Me a Knock-Knock Joke
tip: Say: 'Alexa, tell me a knock-knock joke.' She gets creative.
command: Alexa, tell me a knock-knock joke

title: Alexa, Can You Sneeze?
tip: Ask Alexa to sneeze. She'll hit you with her best fake sneeze.

title: Alexa, Make Me a Sandwich
tip: Say: 'Alexa, make me a sandwich.' See how sassy she gets.

title: Alexa, Sing Me a Song
tip: Ask Alexa to sing. The AI pipes up with her own original.

title: Alexa, Can You Beat Siri?
tip: Ask Alexa if she can beat Siri in a fight. The response is gold.
